   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Personal Trainer App's documentation!
================================================

The Personal Trainer App is a web based application that is designed to be used by a fictional personal training business.
It is built on the Django framework, coded in python/html/css/bootstrap/javascript, and uses a sqlite3 database for storing user information.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   tutorial
   project
   modules/views
